# baseBackgroundColor

**Instance Property**

A color for the paste button’s background.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var baseBackgroundColor: UIColor? { get set }
```

## Discussion

This color fills the shape you choose for [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPasteControl/Configuration-swift.class/cornerStyle] (Swift) or [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPasteControlConfiguration/cornerStyle] (Objective-C).

## Coloring the button

- **baseForegroundColor**: A color for the paste button’s icon and text.
